attributes.action: Stop addition of bio fules for vehicles untill the sourcing of bio fuels is not from food items ie maize etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been food riots in Haiti because the poorest people cannot afford to buy food, although there is plenty of food in Haiti! The price of food has doubled over the last 6 months fuelled by the increasing western requirement for bio fuels in vehicles. These people must be able to feed there families from their own efforts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
